desc.cn: 面向开发人员和团队的排名第一的容器化软件
desc.en: The #1 containerization software for developers and teams

arch/pacman.cmd:
wget https://download.docker.com/linux/static/stable/x86_64/docker-27.2.1.tgz -qO- | tar xvfz - docker/docker --strip-components=1 && \
mv ./docker /usr/local/bin && \
x curl 'https://desktop.docker.com/linux/main/amd64/173168/docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst' -OL 'docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst' && \
sudo pacman -U ./docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst

archcraft/pacman.cmd:
wget https://download.docker.com/linux/static/stable/x86_64/docker-27.2.1.tgz -qO- | tar xvfz - docker/docker --strip-components=1 && \
mv ./docker /usr/local/bin && \
x curl 'https://desktop.docker.com/linux/main/amd64/173168/docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst' -OL 'docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst' && \
sudo pacman -U ./docker-desktop-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst

rhel/dnf.cmd:
sudo subscription-manager repos --enable codeready-builder-for-rhel-9-$(arch)-rpms && \
sudo dnf install https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-9.noarch.rpm && \
sudo dnf install pass && \
sudo dnf install gnome-shell-extension-appindicator && \
sudo gnome-extensions enable appindicatorsupport@rgcjonas.gmail.com && \
sudo dnf install gnome-terminal && \
sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/rhel/docker-ce.repo && \
x curl 'https://desktop.docker.com/linux/main/amd64/docker-desktop-x86_64.rpm?utm_source=docker&utm_medium=webreferral&utm_campaign=docs-driven-download-linux-amd64' -OL 'docker-desktop-x86_64-rhel.rpm' && \
sudo dnf install ./docker-desktop-x86_64-rhel.rpm

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd: x scoop bucket add main && x scoop install main/docker

win/powershell.cmd:
x curl -L https://desktop.docker.com/win/main/amd64/173168/Docker%20Desktop%20Installer.exe -o 'Docker Desktop Installer.exe' && \
x pwsh Start-Process 'Docker Desktop Installer.exe' -Wait install
